UPDATE recommendations SET recommendation_type = 'New' WHERE recommendation_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET age = age + 1 WHERE age < 30
UPDATE user_activity SET timestamp = NOW() WHERE activity_type = 'login'
UPDATE recommendations SET product_id = 12345, recommendation_type = 'new' WHERE user_id = 100

UPDATE Offers SET offer_discount = 0.2 WHERE offer_id = 2;
UPDATE Users SET age = age + 1 WHERE gender = 'Male';
UPDATE UserActivity SET activity_type = 'Log Out' WHERE activity_type = 'Sign Out' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE Offers SET offer_discount = 0.2 WHERE offer_type = 'Discount' AND offer_discount > 0.2;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 'user_id_here';
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type = 'new_activity_type' WHERE user_id = 'user_id_here';
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_name = 'new_preference_name' WHERE user_id = 'user_id_here';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE username='john_doe';
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type='login' WHERE user_id=(SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username='john_doe');
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_name='Dark Theme' WHERE user_id=(SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username='john_doe');
